Translations.Text: Recall ti Li far vi inheritors â€˜Aad establ vi ter mason mansions its val carving hejm its mont! Vi memor di blessings ne roam ter corruptingly
arrogant estr his popol dir al komun popol kred Kiel do vi kon ti Saaleh send his Lord Ili dir message li brought far us believers
arrogant unu dir Ni disbelieve en ki vi kred en
Subsequently ili bucx kamel ribel their Lord's ordon dir O Saaleh bring doom vi minac us vi est really messenger
Consequently quake annihilated them las them dead their hejm
Li torn them dir O my popol mi liver my Lord's message vi advised vi vi ne like any advisers
Lot dir al his popol Vi commit such abomen; ne 1 en des mond done gxi antaux
Vi practice seks hom women Ja vi est transgressing popol
